resources.string: "Set your preferred date and time to cook your pizzas! I will help you remember the key steps for the dough preparation. "
Mix together the preferment ingredients.Place them for one hour at room temperature and then in the fridge until its time to make the dough!
Mix the preferment with the rest of the ingredients and let them rest in the fridge until its time to portion them into balls.
Portion the dough into the amount of balls you have chosen, each one having the weight you have chosen
Your oven should be nice and hot with its pizza stone hot. Enjoy your pizzas!

Place your stone inside the oven and set it to max temperature. Now is a perfect time to do your mise en place! Cut your cheeses, veggies and other toppings for the pizzas.In 1 hour from now you will be eating delicious pizzas!
